ARGUMENT
g

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tfrlem.1 | |- A = { f | E. x e. On ( f Fn x /\ A. y e. x ( f ` y ) = ( F ` ( f |` y ) ) ) } |
| 2 |  | #P_reluni | |- ( Rel U. A <-> A. g e. A Rel g ) |
| 3 | 1 | #P_tfrlem4 | |- ( g e. A -> Fun g ) |
| 4 |  | #P_funrel | |- ( Fun g -> Rel g ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( g e. A -> Rel g ) |
| 6 | 2, 5 | #P_mprgbir | |- Rel U. A |
| 7 | 1 | #P_recsfval | |- recs ( F ) = U. A |
| 8 | 7 | #P_releqi | |- ( Rel recs ( F ) <-> Rel U. A ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_mpbir | |- Rel recs ( F ) |
